A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Oh the script - it needed another go\,.. Vapid romance sequences that didn’t drive the story forward. Writing and new casting that was just trying to tick every box but the one that demanded a better narrative. Ham acting where decent actors were given such poor direction that it descended into either caricature or melodrama. Not enough heart or action for my liking. And I will never ever forgive whoever sanctioned the Yoda moment. Whoever you are\, hang your head in shame!
